summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of $150.00 from the general fund of the City of Seattle to pay the claim of Mayme Beatrice Geltz and J. W. Geltz, for personal injuries received by said Mayme Beatrice Geltz on the 18th day of December 1917, at about 5:00 p.m. while walking easterly on Leary Avenue on the southerly side thereof, between Sunset Place and Dayton Street, Seattle and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
